title: Open positions
description: We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Develop high-quality, responsive web applications in a fast-paced environment. You'll work with modern frameworks like React and be responsible for optimizing performance.

details.label: About Role
details.text: Build efficient web applications with a focus on user experience. A solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required.

details.label: Responsibilities
details.text: Implement new features and improve the application UI/UX. Collaborate with the backend team for seamless integration.

details.label: Qualifications
details.text: Expert in modern frontend frameworks like React or Angular, with strong experience in performance optimization.

details.label: Skills
details.text: Experience with React or Vue.js, Git, and testing frameworks like Jest.

details.label: Experience
details.text: 5+ years of experience in front-end development.

details.label: Education
details.text: Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field.

jobs.title: Junior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Join a dynamic team to develop responsive web apps using JavaScript frameworks. Gain experience working on high-impact projects.

details.label: About Role
details.text: Work closely with senior developers to create high-quality front-end solutions using React or Angular.

details.label: Responsibilities
details.text: Assist in implementing new features and maintaining existing ones. Ensure compatibility across devices.

details.label: Qualifications
details.text: Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and at least one modern frontend framework.

details.label: Skills
details.text: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Familiarity with Git and CI/CD pipelines.

details.label: Experience
details.text: 1-2 years of front-end development experience.

details.label: Education
details.text: Bachelor's degree in software engineering or equivalent.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both front-end and back-end development to create robust and scalable web applications.

details.label: About Role
details.text: Develop and maintain both client-side and server-side code. Expertise in React and Node.js is required.

details.label: Responsibilities
details.text: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver full-stack solutions.

details.label: Qualifications
details.text: Proficiency in JavaScript frameworks and back-end technologies like Node.js.

details.label: Skills
details.text: Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

details.label: Experience
details.text: 3-5 years of experience in full-stack development.

details.label: Education
details.text: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.

jobs.title: React Developer
jobs.description: Specialize in developing single-page applications using React. You will work on both client and internal projects.

details.label: About Role
details.text: Build interactive UI components using React. Ensure code quality and performance.

details.label: Responsibilities

details.label: Qualifications

details.label: Skills

details.label: Experience
details.text: 2+ years of React development experience.

details.label: Education
details.text: Bachelor's degree in computer science preferred.
